SANDY_HEN.title: Sandy Hen
SANDY_HEN.about: A distant cousin of the Stony Hen, Sandy Hens have evolved their feathers to mimic the appearance of beach sands to escape from predators. They camouflage quite well, however they still can't escape the watchful eyes of cocoa slimes, who are almost always perched upon their palm tree homes. Cocoa slimes prefer the dry taste of Sandy chickens to counter act their overflowing amounts of liquid that they contain within. For humans, Sandy chickens taste similar to regular chickens, the only difference being that they are extremely dry to the tongue.

BLOWTATO_VEGGIE.title: Blowtato
BLOWTATO_VEGGIE.about: The blowtato is a volatile variant of Earth's potato, found exclusively in the Indigo Quarry. It is very reactive in nature due to its chemical composition. It is recommended to make a slight cut to the blowtato before cooking to prevent it from exploding. Mine slimes love the blowtato as it contains enough chemicals to fuel them. Miners often use the blowtato to weaken rocks for mining.
